content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 4, Espanyol 0.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 4, Espanyol 0.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Joan Capdevila.
Attempt saved. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by David Villa.
